feed.title: Against Allowing Quantum Recovery of Bitcoin

entry.title: Against Allowing Quantum Recovery of Bitcoin
entry.summary:
I'm sorry, but it seems there was a misunderstanding. You haven't provided the actual content or details of the email that needs to be summarized into a blog post. The text you've shared mentions a date and some names along with a reference to being part of the "Bitcoin Development Mailing List" group, but no specific information about the content of the email is given.
To proceed effectively, could you please share the main points or the detailed content of the email that you'd like to be summarized? This would enable me to create a comprehensive summary following the guidelines you've outlined.
